titles.title: For Unto Us A Child Is Born

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: For unto us a child is born, newline Unto us a Son is given, newline Unto us a Son is given; newline And His name shall be called newline Wonderful, Counselor, newline The mighty God, newline The Everlasting Father, newline The Prince of Peace; newline The Everlasting Father, newline The Prince of Peace.
